model.gameoflife.boards

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.gameoflife.boards.Board
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicBoard, FixedBoard

    public abstract class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an abstract class that represents the game board in Game Of Life
    See Also:
    FixedBoard, DynamicBoard

      Enumerations of the board types available

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void beforeUpdate()
      This method is inherited from Board and is used the check if we need to expand the edges before running the algorithm
      abstract Board clone()
      This method is overrided from Object and is used to clone a dynamic game board with its meta data
      abstract int[] getBoundingBox()
      Method that gives the smallest array to fit a specified pattern
      abstract byte getCellAliveState(int row, int column)
      Returns the byte value of the cell at the given position
      abstract int getColumns()
      Returns the boards columns
      abstract MetaData getMetaData()
      Returns the meta data object
      abstract int getRows()
      Returns the boards rows
      abstract void resetBoard()
      Sets the first generation board.

        public abstract byte getCellAliveState(int row,

        Returns the byte value of the cell at the given position

      • setCellAliveState

        public abstract void setCellAliveState(int row,
                                       int column,
                                       byte aliveState)
        Sets the byte value of the cell at the given position to the byte value given in aliveState.
        Parameters:
        row - The specified row position
        column - The specified column position
        aliveState - 0 or 1 to represent dead or alive cell

        clone in class java.lang.Object

        public abstract int[] getBoundingBox()
